name: RPG to educate and get a job with a busty woman Aya
name_original: RPG to educate and get a job with a busty woman Aya
description:
90 CG images, not including differences

● The purpose is to get a job for the requested Aya.
It's up to the player to get it right or to use his body to remove it.

● Aya's body changes depending on the amount of food. The parts are the chest, abdomen, and lower body.
Let's find out your favorite body shape.

● In some professions, style is more important than ability.
Also, even in a profession where style is not important, if the body is naughty
There are times when you cannot get a proper evaluation of your ability.

● You can confess to Aya and get married as a lover (in that case, go to ED immediately) and have a physical relationship only.
You can also build it.

● Even if Aya is pregnant, she can be taken around (except in the latter half of pregnancy).

● Aya may be conceived by a man other than the main character.
